verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> there were at <S%G490>Antioch,<s%> in the <S%G1577>church<s%> that was [there], <S%G4396>prophets<s%> and <S%G1320>teachers:<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas,<s%> and <S%G4826>Simeon<s%> who was <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G3526>Niger,<s%> and <S%G3066>Lucius<s%> of <S%G2956>Cyrene,<s%> and <S%G3127>Manaen<s%> who had been <S%G4939>brought<s%> up with <S%G2264>Herod<s%> the <S%G5068>tetrarch,<s%> and <S%G4569>Saul.<s%>

And while they were <S%G3008>ministering<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> and <S%G3522>fasting,<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G873>"Set<s%> <S%G873>apart<s%> for Me <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> and <S%G4569>Saul<s%> for the <S%G2041>work<s%> to <S%G3739>which<s%> I have <S%G4341>called<s%> them."
<S%G5119>Then,<s%> when they had <S%G3522>fasted<s%> and <S%G4336>prayed<s%> and <S%G2007>laid<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> on them, they <S%G630>sent<s%> them <S%G630>away.<s%>

<S%G3767>So,<s%> being <S%G1599>sent<s%> out by the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> they <S%G2718>went<s%> <S%G2718>down<s%> to <S%G4581>Seleucia<s%> and from <S%G1564>there<s%> they <S%G636>sailed<s%> to <S%G2954>Cyprus.<s%>

And when they <S%G1096>reached<s%> <S%G4529>Salamis,<s%> they [began] to <S%G2605>proclaim<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews;<s%> and they <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> as their <S%G5257>helper.<s%>

And when they had <S%G1330>gone<s%> <S%G1330>through<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3520>island<s%> as <S%G891>far<s%> as <S%G3974>Paphos,<s%> they <S%G2147>found<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3097>magician,<s%> a <S%G2453>Jewish<s%> <S%G5578>false<s%> <S%G5578>prophet<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> was Bar-Jesus,

<S%G3739>who<s%> was with the <S%G446>proconsul,<s%> <S%G4588>Sergius<s%> <S%G3972>Paulus,<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> of <S%G4908>intelligence.<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G4341>summoned<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> and <S%G4569>Saul<s%> and <S%G1934>sought<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But <S%G1681>Elymas<s%> the <S%G3097>magician<s%> (for <S%G3779>thus<s%> his <S%G3686>name<s%> is <S%G3177>translated<s%>) was <S%G436>opposing<s%> them, <S%G2212>seeking<s%> to <S%G1294>turn<s%> the <S%G446>proconsul<s%> <S%G1294>away<s%> from the <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

But <S%G4569>Saul,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> was <S%G2532>also<s%> [known as] <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G4092>filled<s%> with the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G816>fixed<s%> his <S%G816>gaze<s%> upon him,

and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "You who are <S%G4134>full<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1388>deceit<s%> and <S%G4468>fraud,<s%> you <S%G5207>son<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil,<s%> you <S%G2190>enemy<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> will you not <S%G3973>cease<s%> to <S%G1294>make<s%> <S%G1294>crooked<s%> the <S%G2117>straight<s%> <S%G3598>ways<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>?

"And <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is upon you, and you will be <S%G5185>blind<s%> and not <S%G991>see<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> for a <S%G2540>time.<s%>" And <S%G3916>immediately<s%> a <S%G887>mist<s%> and a <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> upon him, and he <S%G4013>went<s%> <S%G4013>about<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> those <S%G5497>who<s%> would <S%G5497>lead<s%> him by the <S%G5497>hand.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G446>proconsul<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> when he <S%G3708>saw<s%> what had <S%G1096>happened,<s%> being <S%G1605>amazed<s%> at the <S%G1322>teaching<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and his <S%G3588>companions<s%> <S%G4012><s%> <S%G321>put<s%> out to <S%G321>sea<s%> from <S%G3974>Paphos<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G4011>Perga<s%> in <S%G3828>Pamphylia;<s%> and <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G672>left<s%> them and <S%G5290>returned<s%> to <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>

But <S%G1330>going<s%> on from <S%G4011>Perga,<s%> they <S%G3854>arrived<s%> at <S%G4099>Pisidian<s%> <S%G490>Antioch,<s%> and on the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> they <S%G2064>went<s%> into the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> and <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down.<s%>

And <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G320>reading<s%> of the <S%G3551>Law<s%> and the <S%G4396>Prophets<s%> the <S%G752>synagogue<s%> <S%G752>officials<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G435>"Brethren,<s%> <S%G80><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you have <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G3874>exhortation<s%> for the <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> it."

And <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G450>stood<s%> up, and <S%G2678>motioning<s%> with his <S%G5495>hand,<s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G435>"Men<s%> of <S%G2475>Israel,<s%> and you who <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> listen: <S%G191><s%>

"The <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2274>Israel<s%> <S%G1586>chose<s%> our <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> and <S%G5312>made<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G5312>great<s%> <S%G1722>during<s%> their <S%G3940>stay<s%> in the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> and with an <S%G5308>uplifted<s%> <S%G1023>arm<s%> He <S%G1806>led<s%> them out from it.
"And for a <S%G5550>period<s%> of <S%G5613>about<s%> <S%G5066>forty<s%> <S%G5066>years<s%> He <S%G5159>put<s%> up with them in the <S%G2048>wilderness.<s%>

"And when He had <S%G2507>destroyed<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> in the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G5477>Canaan,<s%> He <S%G2624>distributed<s%> their <S%G1093>land<s%> as an <S%G2624>inheritance<s%> â€“ [all of which took] <S%G5613>about<s%> <S%G5071>four<s%> <S%G5071>hundred<s%> and <S%G4004>fifty<s%> <S%G2094>years.<s%>
"And <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> He <S%G1325>gave<s%> [them] <S%G2923>judges<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G4545>Samuel<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>

"And <S%G2547>then<s%> they <S%G154>asked<s%> for a <S%G935>king,<s%> and <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> them <S%G4549>Saul<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2797>Kish,<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> of the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G958>Benjamin,<s%> for <S%G5065>forty<s%> <S%G2094>years.<s%>

"And after He had <S%G3179>removed<s%> him, He <S%G1453>raised<s%> up <S%G7035>David<s%> to be their <S%G935>king,<s%> concerning <S%G3739>whom<s%> He <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3140>testified<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'I have <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G7035>David<s%> the son of <S%G2421>Jesse,<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> My <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> will <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> My <S%G2307>will.<s%>'

"From the <S%G4690>offspring<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G1860>promise,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G71>brought<s%> to <S%G2274>Israel<s%> a <S%G4990>Savior,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%>

after <S%G2491>John<s%> had <S%G4296>proclaimed<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> His <S%G4383>coming<s%> <S%G1529><s%> a <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> of <S%G2274>Israel.<s%>

"And <S%G5613>while<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> was <S%G4137>completing<s%> his <S%G1408>course,<s%> he kept <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>'What<s%> do you <S%G5282>suppose<s%> that I <S%G1510>am<s%>? I <S%G1510>am<s%> not [He.] But <S%G2400>behold,<s%> one is <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> me the <S%G5266>sandals<s%> of <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not <S%G514>worthy<s%> to <S%G3089>untie.<s%>'

<S%G435>"Brethren,<s%> <S%G80><s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of Abraham's <S%G1085>family,<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you who <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> to us the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> is <S%G1821>sent<s%> out.

"For <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2730>live<s%> in <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> and their <S%G758>rulers,<s%> <S%G50>recognizing<s%> neither Him <S%G2532>nor<s%> the <S%G5456>utterances<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> which are <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4521>Sabbath,<s%> <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> [these] by <S%G2919>condemning<s%> [Him].
"And though they <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G156>ground<s%> for [putting Him to] death, they <S%G154>asked<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> that He be <S%G337>executed.<s%>

"And <S%G5613>when<s%> they had <S%G5055>carried<s%> out <S%G3956>all<s%> that was <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> Him, they <S%G2507>took<s%> Him <S%G2507>down<s%> from the <S%G3586>cross<s%> and <S%G5087>laid<s%> Him in a <S%G3419>tomb.<s%>
"But <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> Him from the <S%G3498>dead;<s%>

and for <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> He <S%G3708>appeared<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4872>came<s%> up with Him from <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> the very <S%G3748>ones<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> are <S%G3568>now<s%> His <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> to the <S%G2992>people.<s%>
"And we <S%G2097>preach<s%> to you the <S%G2097>good<s%> <S%G2097>news<s%> of the <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> to the <S%G3962>fathers,<s%>

that <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1603>fulfilled<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> [promise] to our <S%G5043>children<s%> in that He <S%G450>raised<s%> up <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> as it is <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G5568>Psalm,<s%> 'Thou <S%G1510>art<s%> My <S%G5207>Son;<s%> <S%G4594>today<s%> I have <S%G1080>begotten<s%> Thee.'

"[And as for the fact] that He <S%G450>raised<s%> Him up from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G3371>no<s%> <S%G3371>more<s%> to <S%G5290>return<s%> to <S%G1312>decay,<s%> He has <S%G3004>spoken<s%> in <S%G3779>this<s%> <S%G3779>way:<s%> 'I will <S%G1325>give<s%> you the <S%G3741>holy<s%> [and] <S%G4103>sure<s%> [blessings] of <S%G7035>David.<s%>'

<S%G1360>"Therefore<s%> He <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> in <S%G2087>another<s%> [Psalm,] 'Thou wilt not <S%G1325>allow<s%> Thy <S%G3741>Holy<s%> <S%G3741>One<s%> to <S%G3708>undergo<s%> <S%G1312>decay.<s%>'

"For <S%G7035>David,<s%> after he had <S%G5256>served<s%> the <S%G1012>purpose<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1074>generation,<s%> <S%G2837>fell<s%> <S%G2837>asleep,<s%> and was <S%G4369>laid<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> his <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> and <S%G3708>underwent<s%> <S%G1312>decay;<s%>
but He <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> did not <S%G3708>undergo<s%> <S%G1312>decay.<s%>

<S%G3767>"Therefore<s%> let it be <S%G1110>known<s%> to you, <S%G435>brethren,<s%> <S%G80><s%> that <S%G1223>through<s%> Him <S%G859>forgiveness<s%> of <S%G266>sins<s%> is <S%G2605>proclaimed<s%> to you,

and <S%G1722>through<s%> Him <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G4100>believes<s%> is <S%G1344>freed<s%> from <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> from <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G1410>could<s%> not be <S%G1344>freed<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G3551>Law<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses.<s%>
<S%G991>"Take<s%> <S%G991>heed<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G3361>so<s%> that the <S%G3004>thing<s%> <S%G3004>spoken<s%> of in the <S%G4396>Prophets<s%> may not <S%G1904>come<s%> upon [you]:

<S%G3708>'Behold,<s%> you <S%G2707>scoffers,<s%> and <S%G2296>marvel,<s%> and <S%G853>perish;<s%> For I am <S%G2038>accomplishing<s%> a <S%G2041>work<s%> in your <S%G2250>days,<s%> A <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you will <S%G3756>never<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G4100>believe,<s%> <S%G1437>though<s%> <S%G5100>someone<s%> should <S%G1555>describe<s%> it to you.' "

And as Paul and Barnabas were <S%G1826>going<s%> out, the people kept <S%G3870>begging<s%> that <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G4487>things<s%> might be <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to them the <S%G3342>next<s%> <S%G4521>Sabbath.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when [the meeting of] the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> had <S%G3089>broken<s%> up, <S%G4183>many<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> and of the <S%G2316>God-fearing<s%> <S%G4339>proselytes<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and <S%G921>Barnabas,<s%> <S%G3748>who,<s%> <S%G4354>speaking<s%> to them, were <S%G3982>urging<s%> them to <S%G4357>continue<s%> in the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of God.
And the <S%G2064>next<s%> <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> <S%G4975>nearly<s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G4863>assembled<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But when the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> the <S%G3793>crowds,<s%> they were <S%G4092>filled<s%> with <S%G2205>jealousy,<s%> and [began] <S%G483>contradicting<s%> the <S%G2980>things<s%> <S%G2980>spoken<s%> by <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> and were <S%G987>blaspheming.<s%>

And <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G3955>spoke<s%> out <S%G3955>boldly<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "It was <S%G316>necessary<s%> that the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> should be <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to you <S%G4413>first;<s%> <S%G1894>since<s%> you <S%G683>repudiate<s%> it, and <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> <S%G3756>unworthy<s%> <S%G514><s%> of <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> we are <S%G4762>turning<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>

"For <S%G3779>thus<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> has <S%G1781>commanded<s%> us, 'I have <S%G5087>placed<s%> You as a <S%G5457>light<s%> for the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> That You should <S%G1510>bring<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> to the <S%G2078>end<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>'"

And when the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> this, they [began] <S%G5463>rejoicing<s%> and <S%G1392>glorifying<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> and as <S%G3745>many<s%> as had <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G5021>appointed<s%> to <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G4100>believed.<s%>
And the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> was being <S%G1308>spread<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G5561>region.<s%>

But the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3951>aroused<s%> the <S%G4576>devout<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> of <S%G2158>prominence<s%> and the <S%G4413>leading<s%> <S%G4413>men<s%> of the <S%G4172>city,<s%> and <S%G1892>instigated<s%> a <S%G1375>persecution<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and <S%G921>Barnabas,<s%> and <S%G1544>drove<s%> them out of their <S%G3725>district.<s%>
